TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 1003
TEI.2.document_title: J. D. Bludworth to Andrew Roberson, 12-22-1824

barker_notes.barker_summary: Bill of sale for a horse.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 1003

div1.p: Bill of sale for a horse.

Rd Of Andrew Roberson one hundred and Eighty Dollars for a bay horse fifteen or sixteen hands high which horse I warrant and for Ever defend from the Lawfull Clame of anny person or persons given under my hand this 22th of Decr. 1824
